sentences.sContent: 50% of men under 35 spend at least 20 minutes preening themselves every morning in the bathroom.
sentences.sCn: 50%的35岁以下男性每天早上至少花20分钟在盥洗室精心打扮。

trans.tranCn: (鸟)用嘴整理, 打扮, 赞扬
trans.tranOther: if a bird preens or preens itself, it cleans itself and makes its feathers smooth using its beak
